name: Audio Book
what_you_do: Entrepreneur, author, motivational speaker, and radio show host dedicated to empowering men and women to reach their full potential.
who_you_serve: Men and women seeking personal transformation, happiness, and to live extraordinary lives.
social_proof: Author of 9 books, 25 years of personal transformation experience, successful mid-level manager of a multi-million dollar building supply center by age 21.
signature_programs: Black Men Rock!, What If Jesus Were a Coach, The Good News Is: The Future Is Brighter Than You Think
business_focus: Coaching and inspiring others to overcome adversity and create fulfilling lives through books, lectures, and radio programming.
service_provided: Motivational speaking, authoring books, radio show hosting, life coaching
